text: Okay there are things that I absolutely adore about MoneyLion, and there are things that have become unacceptable about MoneyLion. I’ve been a member for the past three years. They have THE worst Customer Service. I am still unable to change my form of payment. I was unable to change my mailing address for months. So I couldn’t receive a Roar Money debit card when they switched from the money lion checking to Roar Money. BUT I love their Instacash! I love all their features. Which is why I’ve stayed with them despite the horrendous Customer Service.  It’s 50/50. Half of them I can’t live without; half can’t live with!
title: Okay there are things that I absolutely…

text: Ever since the accounts switched over i have had problems with my Instacash. I was told that the repayment date is based off my direct deposit. My payday switched from mondays to fridays and the system still cannot get it right. I call and no one can do anything. Its frustrating because i am constantly getting alerts and reminders about instacash but no one wants to do anything to get it right. Also i had a few refunds that went back to the account that closed when things switched over  and no one can tell me how to get that corrected. I just thought this would be better.
title: Problems with the new account and Instacash???

reply.message: We created Instacash to help you access extra money to cover everyday essentials and unexpected expenses, and we designed it to be easy to pay back. For these reasons, we allow you to take out Instacash in increments of $50 or less. Of course, if you’ve unlocked an Instacash limit higher than $50, it will all still be available to you if you need it. You’ll just have to take it out in advances of $50 at a time. We appreciate your feedback, and if you have any other questions, please feel free to contact us directly.
